creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
description:
stove: round jar with tripod legs; circular mouth with a short neck; legs are rounded at top, then narrow and flare slightly at feet; orange band at top with black wavy lines; white cloud-like motif with orange highlights on body 
bowl: wide bowl; narrow lip with white wavy lines; short foot with orange wavy lines at base; body adorned with curvilinear designs in white, red, yellow and orange; numerous short slash marks at inside bottom
title: Stove and bowl, from a set
